about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling virtual safari in 'VR Forest Hunt,' where the untamed wilderness comes to life in stunning detail. With multiple game modes, including the challenging safari forest hunt and the adrenaline-pumping night forest hunt, each session offers a unique and intense experience.

As you venture deeper into the forest, the danger grows. Lions, tigers, and other predators prowl the shadows, waiting for the perfect moment to strike. Your survival skills will be put to the test as you navigate through the dense foliage, relying on your wits and reflexes to stay one step ahead of the deadly wildlife.

But it's not just about survival; it's also about the thrill of the hunt. Track your prey through the dense undergrowth, taking careful aim before unleashing a perfectly placed shot. Every animal you bring down adds to your score, but be warned: these creatures won't go down without a fight.

With stunningly realistic graphics and immersive gameplay, 'VR Forest Hunt' transports you to a world where danger and excitement lurk around every corner. Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate hunter, or will you become the hunted?

name: Forest Hunt - VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon R9 290
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 / AMD Ryzen 7 or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 / any NVIDIA RTX cards

publishers: Saturn VR , NipsApp Gaming Software Pvt. Ltd.

With multiple game modes, including the challenging safari forest hunt and the adrenaline-pumping night forest hunt, each session offers a unique and intense experience.
